name: Belly of the Beast
description:
Play as an explorer making their way through the veins of a giant beast in their airship to destroy the beast's heart. Fight off deadly enemies and navigate treacherous terrain as you travel deeper into the belly of the beast.

Features:
Ship piloting 
Different enemy types
thick atmosphere
Fire-able ship cannons

How to play(player):
-WASD for movement
-E to interact
-Left Mouse Button to fire your weapons
-ESC for pause menu
-Mouse to move the camera
-R to reset the game
-Shift to run

How to play(boat):
-WASD for movement
-E to interact
-ESC for pause menu
-C to change camera view (1st or 3rd)
-SPACE to move the ship up (vertically)
-CONTROL to move the ship down (vertically)
-R to reset the game
